content: [eyvind] "Agreed. I've got more faith in your success than our own."
[eyvind] "Alette, I'll miss our talks, but we both have plenty to keep us busy. Take care."
[eyvind] "Alette, I'm so proud of you. There are hidden patterns on your bow which will only become clear with practice. Take care."
[eyvind] "Because I--"
[eyvind] "Be well, Rook."
[eyvind] "Even the chasms opening across the land are displayed, but your path to Arberrang is clear."
/=Eyvind gives you both a weak smile and shrugs.=/
[eyvind] "I was trying--"
[eyvind juno] "Clans will vie for power the way they always do, even in the face of destruction."
[eyvind juno] "Just use what you've learned on this journey to keep the others alive."
[eyvind] "The darkness is a mistake, a part of this world never meant for you, or us, or anyone alive today."
[eyvind] "We realize this isn't easy for you; it's not easy for anyone now."
[$hero] "Depths! We might have been able to save Jorundr and the other varl at Einartoft if it wasn't for you two!"
[$hero] "Don't expect me to trust you. Just take care of Iver."
[$hero] "Everyone on your feet! We're pushing to Arberrang!"
[$hero] "How many died when we floated across that chasm?"
[$hero] "How will I know if you succeed?"
[$hero] "I can't make you tell me all the secrets you're keeping, Valka, but I know you're keeping them."
[$hero] "I should get the clan ready to head up the coast and west to Arberrang."
[$hero] "Is that supposed to make me feel better?"
[$hero] "Or when the Serpent came for you?"
[$hero] "Thank you, Iver. You're probably right."
[$hero] "That doesn't really put me at ease."
[$hero] "Then I hope luck is with you as well. Take care of Iver."
[$hero] "Then why is it here?"
[$hero] "Till we see each other again, then?"
[$hero] "You as well, Eyvind."
/=You consider what to say.=/

content.option: "I still don't understand why you need Iver."
"There are so few of us because of you two!"

content: [$hero] /=You say nothing to Eyvind, still doubting the intentions of the menders.=/
/=You shake your head but refuse to look at the varl.=/
/=No words come to mind, so you simply nod.=/
/=Iver and Eyvind find a small fishing skiff. The once clear water of the Fiska Bay is turning green and foul as the varl hauls the vessel toward the receding tide.=/
[iver] "Before I go, I think it's time you became Alette again."
/=Iver exhales loudly, like he is releasing a breath he has held in for ages.=/
[iver $hero] "A one-armed varl brings good luck."
[iver $hero] "Depends on where we're going. I might like it there better than being around you."
[iver $hero] "If you were anyone else, I'd stick around to help, but there's no one alive better suited to take care of these folks."
[iver $hero] "In some form or another, I imagine."
[iver $hero] "Still, you could've made it seem a /=little=/ harder to say goodbye."
[iver $hero] "Stop. You're mad and that's fine, but don't start blaming them for everything that's gone wrong under the sun."
[iver $hero] /=The giant varl gives you a fake frown.=/
[iver] "I doubt that will change even if I live another century or two, and it sure won't change with distance. Understand?"
[iver] "In all my years, I've never had another friend than you."
[iver] "In all my years, you and your father are the only two I could call friends."
/=Iver arches his eyebrows and looks at the Valka who is staring at you.=/
[iver] "Oh, and Rook? Do everyone a favor: Clean yourself up. Depths! You're about to see your king."
[iver] "Or /=me=/?"
[iver] "These people deserve to look their leader in the eye."
[iver] "Your hood might still serve you in a fight, but otherwise, pull it down."
[juno] "And even then, you will perish if /=we=/ do not succeed."
[juno] "And even then, you will perish if /=we=/ do not succeed."
[juno] "But leaving now is our only chance to stop that number from rising."
[juno] "Continue to push hard for the capital. With luck, my small force will face and defeat the Darkness before it reaches you. I hope our efforts will not be in vain."
[juno] "Eyvind's words are true, but we must succeed. All of us."
[juno] "Eyvind, that's enough!"
[juno $hero] "It's the same resolve you use daily, and you will have Hakon and the remaining varl with you for strength."
[juno $hero] "Speed will be your ally now. With so few, you should be able to outpace whatever comes your way."
[juno] "Hold on until the Darkness breaks."
[juno] "I couldn't have--"
[juno] "I hear the concern in your voice, the doubt and fear. But you are more prepared than you know."
[juno] "I'm sorry for the hardship that has become your life."
[juno] "It's the same resolve you use daily, and you will have Hakon and the remaining varl with you for strength."
[juno] "Iver's strength and resolve will be necessary for us in the days ahead."
[juno] "I've spoken about a Darkness enshrouding the land, and now you bear witness to it on your map."
[juno] "I wish I could promise you nothing but safety, but Arberrang will be the refuge for so many."
/=Juno and Eyvind share a guilty look.=/
[juno] /=Juno's face is solemn as she nods and follows Eyvind and Iver without another word. You turn to the caravan=/.
[juno] "Remember, you are a Sundr-Slayer. Your reputation will help you a great deal."
[juno] "So, hate us if you need to, but stay alive. Hold out for as long as you can."
[juno] "Speed will be your ally now. With so few, you should be able to outpace whatever comes your way."
/=Juno stares at you. Your concern about the darkness starts to fade until Eyvind touches her shoulder.=/
[juno] "The gods may be dead, but a few of their secrets remain."
[juno] "The sky will soon reflect the truth shown here."
[juno] /=The Valka gives you a small smile before following the other two. You turn to the caravan.=/
[juno] "Though it probably means little to hear it from me, you've done great work in making it this far."
[juno] "We're trying to do what we have to."
[juno] "What will assault you in Arberrang will require every bit of your wits and strength to survive."
[juno] "What will assault you in Arberrang will require every bit of your wits and strength to survive."
[juno] "You and the rest of the caravan are needed in Arberrang. What will assault you there will require every bit of your wits and strength to survive."
[juno] "You'll know because you'll still be alive."
[juno] "You must get to the capital. You must stay alive. No matter what occurs, hold out as long as you can."
[juno] "You're right. We /=have=/ cost the lives of many."
/=Looking down at your clothes and hands, you actually laugh and concede the point.=/
/=You consider what to say.=/

content.option: "You keep saying a darkness, but what is it?"

content: /=Silence follows her words.=/
/=You notice her spear moving ever so slightly before your mind moves to other things.=/
{skip} mark1=$hero mark2=juno mark3=iver mark4=eyvind
/=The two of you smile.=/
/=The Valka looks at you, and for a moment, her hard-eyed expression cracks.=/
/=You look at the giant varl who has been with you through so much.=/
/=Your anger hits the two menders like a rough slap.=/
